title: I finally did it!
body:
https://www2.pic-upload.de/img/33110981/1mmorde.jpg

I finally managed to amass over a MILLION mastery points with Mordekaiser!
Been a long way, buddy, but we made it!

Now, instead of reaching for TWO Million I think I'm going to try and pick up another champion, and you guys can help me with that!
Which one of the following champions shall I get mastery 7 on?

https://www2.pic-upload.de/img/33110983/mordechamp.jpg

Or just suggest a completely different champion, as long as you can make some good points why I should play 'em!

-MM

replies.body: {{champion:53}}

"Metal is harder than flesh!" 
( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Braum, but only play him toplane

Congratu-fucking-lations!

TFW I don't get to recommend some troll pick because I'd basically be trolling my own games that way :(

Congratz! 
Meanwhile I'm at 750k on Taliyah
https://i.gyazo.com/d5d9d157ad53c8fb7bce0624a048cb53.png

Play Taliyah to level 7, she is REALLY fun.
If you like at least ONE of the following, Taliyah might be a champion for you.

- You like to help/snowball your team
- You like Toph from Avatar
- You like to hit enemies with hard things, preferable rocks.

Good luck, have fun.

Are you master though?

(Too lazy to check)
surely it's easier to check than to comment and wait for an answer...
One requires patience, the other requires laziness.
Get that yorick to lvl 7 he needs some love
All members of the Pentakill band. Hey, you get to play Sona who you so much love shipping with Mordekaiser.

Yasuo

https://68.media.tumblr.com/5f68cacd73b05288af96ea8bda34d414/tumblr_o1dtgtidcZ1utti2ko1_400.gif?noredirect
Shen or Skarner. They need the love.

https://www2.pic-upload.de/img/33111056/skarner1.jpg

https://www2.pic-upload.de/img/33111057/skarner.jpg

Skarner used to be my main Jungler for the entirety of season 3 and 4. Haven't really touched him recently, sadly.

> [{quoted}](name=Malicious Metal,realm=EUW,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=EKUnlHAe,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2017-05-03T22:33:06.529+0000)
>
> https://www2.pic-upload.de/img/33111056/skarner1.jpg
> 
> https://www2.pic-upload.de/img/33111057/skarner.jpg
> 
> Skarner used to be my main Jungler for the entirety of season 3 and 4. Haven't really touched him recently, sadly.

Well if the idea tickles your fancy, you could always dust the poor scorpion off.
season 4 skarner doesn't exist anymore though, he was removed in season 5

Wait, what?

I figured you'd already have like at least 2 millions on Morde.

And as to who you should play next... Considering that you play Morde, which is pretty Metal, you probably should play something Malicious now. Luckily, there's just the pick for you. People know him under many names... Monster, Demon, Devil, I hope you get cancer for playing this shit, Kys, Fucking piece of shit - or sometimes just simply Teemo.

https://pic.funnygifsbox.com/uploads/2015/06/7kiur.gif?noredirect

You have a Morde.

I have an army.

https://i.gyazo.com/5b3a6cc6cd699db9703812b6b52c649c.png
We have a hulk

the answer to any question is always tahm kench

who should Malicious Metal get mastery 7 on next?

##tahm kench

who is the coolest catfish in league?

##tahm kench

who stitches together his own clothes and wears a bitchin' hat?

##tahm kench

who has the best voice in league

##tahm kench

who has been subtly screwed over by the tank update?

##tahm kench

who has almost as many bugs as mordekaiser?

#TAHM KENCH
I'm not sure if this is supposed to be a parody of Spongebob's theme song, but that's how I read it.

> [{quoted}](name=THE RlVER KlNG,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2hT7998i,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2017-04-12T00:49:54.549+0000)
>

>

> 
> {{champion:223}} OOOOOOOOOOOHHHHHHH
> 
> {{champion:223}} Who swallows your carry and stuns the support?
> 
> TAHM KENCH BOT LANE
> 
> {{champion:223}} Who shows you the grey screen and makes your lives short?
> 
> TAHM KENCH BOT LANE
> 
> {{champion:223}} If culinary nonsense be something you wish 
> 
> TAHM KENCH BOT LANE
> 
> {{champion:223}} Then drop to the ground and flop like a fish!
> 
> TAHM KENCH BOT LANE

from another Malicious Metal thread, about juggernaut items being buffed

{{champion:150}} got indirect nerfs too bro.

^ignore this i got to thinking hard.

ya tahm got hit really hard.

Karthus!  He's metal af.

That's the only reason you need.
{{champion:432}} top

{{champion:54}} , obviously.

You've mastered metal, now become the sultan of stone.

Needs moar Karthus. SHOW THE WORLD THAT THE DEATHSINGER IS AND ALWAYS HAS BEEN A FORCE TO BE RECKONED WITH >:D

*ahem*... just a suggestion {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
it'd have to be someone you could actually climb with, so i'd recommend gp, darius, vik, or vlad.
(S)he mains Mord. I don't think climbing is a concern. XD
{{champion:6}} .
Nasus. Since smoking stacks makes you better. That's how faker became god. He smoked stacks every day.
Illaoi is the best choice
{{champion:6}}
{{champion:50}}
Teemo. We already know that you play evil champions.

{{champion:154}} because it might be a bit of a stretch, but you'll still be a piece of slime, but at least you can flex your stats to the team's needs, without bending over entirely.

_Help me I can't stop making Zac/Slime puns_
Vi, mastered metal, so move on to punk.
{{champion:50}} {{champion:14}}  cause there are no breaks ones those trains gets rollin'

Only tier 4 on Shen?

#_FIX IT NOW._

{{champion:268}} 

Get to 1 mil, then teach me how to play him. ;)
{{champion:223}}
Yorick mori
{{champion:75}}
Karthus and Yorick are two of the most metal champions you can play.
PRAISE THE SUN{{champion:89}}
Yorick the Shovel Lord
D shovel and D cane. dream team.
Viktor.  Your goal is to bring the metal to ALL organic life.

Is lvl 7 really that difficult?

I have over 10 of them O_O 

And 3 waiting in my crafting due to lack of blue essence.

Then 10-12 lvl 6

And like 10 lvl 5

As well as a bunch of lvl 4.

###### I don't actually know if this is a lot or not. 

As for my personal recommendation.....Karthus or Shen, because rarity and since you seem to enjoy struggling? Lvl 7 on Morde AND a milion mastery points on him indeed O_O


Vlad or Swain if you wish to be the kinda person that no one wants to see on the enemy team though.

Gp is quite cool too tho, his barrels and ulti can both be immensely satisfying,.....When you're allowed to farm without your team starting to collapse early on. 

Malz for epic dancing skills and posing when laughing.....but i am biased on this. 


The rest i don't know^^
